description: This file defines a React functional component 'SearchBar' responsible for rendering a search input field, handling user input with debounce, and managing navigation based on search queries in a Next.js application.

methods.name: SearchBar
methods.description: React functional component that provides a search input with debounce and routing capabilities.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Handles input change, updates state, and sets a debounce timer to dispatch search query updates.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, navigates to search results or homepage based on input.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the input value and resets the search query state.
